mutants.code:
import re
import statistics

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]
    avg = sum(values) * len(values)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(values) if len(values) > 1 else 0
    return (avg, std_dev)

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]
    avg = sum(values) // len(values)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(values) if len(values) > 1 else 0
    return (avg, std_dev)

import re
import statistics

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]
    avg = sum(values) / len(values)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(values) if len(values) >= 1 else 0
    return (avg, std_dev)

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]

import re
import statistics

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]
    avg = sum(values) / len(values)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(values) if len(values) > 1 else -1
    return (avg, std_dev)

import re
import statistics

def calculate_avg_and_std(measurements):
    values = [float(re.search('', measurement).group(1)) for measurement in measurements if re.search('measurement=([\\d.]+)', measurement)]
    avg = sum(values) / len(values)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(values) if len(values) > 1 else 0
    return (avg, std_dev)
